Class EditorControlsController

java.lang.Object
com.simulus.controller.EditorControlsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class EditorControlsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The JavaFX controller for the control panel of the map editor.
